doGet

public StubbyResponse doGet(java.lang.String host,
                            java.lang.String uri,
                            int stubsPort)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Makes GET HTTP request to stubby

Parameters:
host - host that stubby4j is running on
uri - URI for the HTTP request
stubsPort - port that stubby4j Stubs is running on
Returns:
StubbyResponse with HTTP status code and message from the server
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

doGetOverSsl

public StubbyResponse doGetOverSsl(java.lang.String host,
                                   java.lang.String uri,
                                   int port,
                                   java.lang.String encodedCredentials)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Makes GET HTTP request to stubby over SSL on stubby4j default SSL port: 7443 Also sets basic authorisation HTTP header using provided encoded credentials. The credentials should be base-64 encoded using the following format - username:password

Parameters:
host - host that stubby4j is running on
uri - URI for the HTTP request
port - SSL port
encodedCredentials - Base 64 encoded username and password for the basic authorisation HTTP header
Returns:
StubbyResponse with HTTP status code and message from the server
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

doGet

                            java.lang.String uri,
                            int stubsPort,
                            java.lang.String encodedCredentials)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Makes GET HTTP request to stubby Also sets basic authorisation HTTP header using provided encoded credentials. The credentials should be base-64 encoded using the following format - username:password

Parameters:
host - host that stubby4j is running on
uri - URI for the HTTP request
stubsPort - port that stubby4j Stubs is running on
encodedCredentials - Base 64 encoded username and password for the basic authorisation HTTP header
Returns:
StubbyResponse with HTTP status code and message from the server
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                                         java.lang.String encodedCredentials)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
Makes GET HTTP request to stubby running on default host and port - localhost:8882. Also sets basic authorisation HTTP header using provided encoded credentials. The credentials should be base-64 encoded using the following format - username:password

Parameters:
uri - URI for the HTTP request
encodedCredentials - Base 64 encoded username and password for the basic authorisation HTTP header

doPost

public StubbyResponse doPost(java.lang.String host,
                             java.lang.String uri,
                             int stubsPort,
                             java.lang.String encodedCredentials,
                             java.lang.String post)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Makes POST HTTP request to stubby Also sets basic authorisation HTTP header using provided encoded credentials. The credentials should be base-64 encoded using the following format - username:password

Parameters:
host - host that stubby4j is running on
uri - URI for the HTTP request
stubsPort - port that stubby4j Stubs is running on
encodedCredentials - Base 64 encoded username and password for the basic authorisation HTTP header
post - data to POST to the server
Returns:
StubbyResponse with HTTP status code and message from the server
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

makeRequest

public StubbyResponse makeRequest(java.lang.String scheme,
                                  java.lang.String method,
                                  java.lang.String host,
                                  java.lang.String uri,
                                  int stubsPort,
                                  java.lang.String post)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Makes HTTP request to stubby.

Parameters:
scheme - HTTP protocol scheme, HTTP or HTTPS
method - HTTP method, currently supported: GET, HEAD, TRACE, OPTIONS, POST
host - host that stubby4j is running on
uri - URI for the HTTP request
stubsPort - port that stubby4j Stubs is running on
post - data to POST to the server
Returns:
StubbyResponse with HTTP status code and message from the server
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
